'''1.20.62''' is a hotfix to {{BE}} released on February 15, 2024,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/24148434660237|title=Minecraft - 1.20.62 (Bedrock)|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=February 15, 2024}}</ref> which fixes some gameplay crashes. It is also the last version which supported iOS 11, iOS 12, Android 5.0, 6.0, 7.0 and 7.1.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed several crashes that could occur during gameplay.
